name: OpenFOAM_flowField_rho
description: Snapshot of a density field in OpenFOAM format (i.e., 'FoamFile' format)

properties.name: version
properties.description: Specifies the version of the FoamFile format

properties.name: class
properties.description: The corresponding OpenFOAM class the entity is based on

properties.name: location
properties.description: Time directory the entity is residing in

properties.name: dimensions
properties.description: String specifying the SI units of the entity

properties.name: internalField
properties.description: List of scalars containing the actual fluid density for each cell
